desc: Lily Smith Studio is a one-woman handmade business based out of Atlanta, GA. Lily makes fun and colorful sterling silver and enamel jewelry, often inspired by fruits and vegetables. She also designs and hand binds sketch books and journals using high-quality paper and book cloth.

layout.text: The Flower Cup Collection is bright, bold, and, best of all, lightweight! They make the perfect accessory for summertime.
